elements.text: CryptoPricey aims to be the easiest and most relaible app for getting announcements ad-hoc and on a schedule for your favorite cryptocurrencies.

text.text:
<http://github.com/cloudstruct/cryptopricey|We also accept feature requests at our GitHub>





*Commands*
There are two slash commands available in any chat where @CryptoPricey has been invited.

*1) /cryptoprice <Comma-separted list of crypto tickers>*

example:
	`/cryptoprice BTC,ETH,ADA`
	This command returns a channel message with the spot price of the associated tickers.

*2) /cryptoprice-config*

example:
	`/cryptoprice-config`
	This command pops up a dialog for configuring scheduled announcement settings.  You only need to fill out the fields that you wish to change if you've already set them.  The pre-populated text is that of the current configuration for the channel which invoked the slash command.
